reviews.review: Not perfect, but a charming and solid take on the typical horde mode shooter. Controls and plays more like a survival horror than a normal FPS. Definitely a fun and mindless killing time to be had.
Muy buen juego, similar al Left 4 Dead. Termina cansando si has jugado mucho al anterior juego nombrado.
One of the best co-op shooter on the market.
Epic survival coop game. With the right people to play with, even better than L4D ;)

Me encantan los mods y los mapas si que dan miedo! No hay donde esconderte ni campear


Lo amo♥

Yo, you wanna slaughter countless abominations with swords as arms? You wanna fuck up some chainsaw wielding carnival monkeys? You wanna take cover in a barn with 5 other people and burn some shit with a flamethrower? YEAH? GET THIS GAME.

Killing Floor is the kind of zombie game that you can't play by yourself.  Like really, if you plan on playing above Normal you probably need help unless you're a headshot god.

So first off, the game is still current and updated, as is proven by the seasonal Zed changes, and the player base is still strong.

The perk system decent and simple.  Kill so many Zeds in such a way or with such a weapon and go up a level.  Basically just play the game, and eventually you'll be good enough to just rock the house.

This is best when played with a group of friends, as the in game chat is really really bad.  Text is the only real option, because voice chat is very distorted and partially garbled.  Friends on a Skype call however, can co-ordinate and achieve victory.
Almost certainly, Killing Floor stands as one of the finest zombie themed asset management simulators of all time.
It's like Skyrim...WITH GUNS.
I love this game! You need time to get into it, but then ... wow!
Esse é fera em
Join the ZOMBIE slaying fananza today or become INFECTED your self

A Co-op zombie game set in Britain. If you can get over the dated graphics, you will find something really fun and awesome here. Excellent fun with friends, and this game keeps getting more and more content added to it. There isn't much to this game aside from "kill lots of zombies," but that's really all that is necessary to make this game work. Much more replayable than Left 4 Dead 2, and all the little quirks and personality this one has, to me, makes this the superior zombie game. Get this if you want to shoot alot of stuff, and especially so if you want to do it with friends.
Ready up and grab some Dosh £££

oh yeah xD

6 Player Coop Survival against waves of mutants where:

The leader can see invisible enemies and gauge their health based on looks.

The melee specialist is deadlier with a knife than a gun.

The sniper can shoot one crosbow bolt, pierce an indefinite amount of skulls (And exploding it) and then retrieve said bolt to be reused.

The bomb specialist can toss a grenade at their feet and survive.

The support locks the doors for no apparent reason.

And the medic has better drugs available and Iron Man's armor.
Bom e barato. Não precisa de mais nada.

Counter Strike meets Painkiller.
AWESOME!!
заебись гама ,стоит брать, тим плей и все хардовое сдесь :P

I picked up Killing Floor during the F2P weekend and basically haven't be able to put it down since. It is admittedly a little rough around the edges (the gun menus leave a lot to be desired) but the game is a tonne of fun. The ragdoll physics and exploding body parts make every pistol shot satisfying. If you enjoyed L4D even in the slightest you're in for a real treat. It is almost like a mix of L4D and TF2; the different classes keep the gameplay fresh and the game has a great difficulty slider.
Was once an 'indie' game, though it is now much more. Weapon handling and art fantastically realistic. Tons of fun to play with friends. A good game at $20. A no brainer purchase when its on sale.
This game is actually really addictive.
Jogo muito bom, curti muito !!!
Fun and cheap

Killing Floor is a zombie wave-defense game where players have to move about the map for supplies while defending against hordes of various types of infected. The game engine itself is a little dated; definitely has a "clunky" and retro feel to the game. The game offers some great hours of mindless fun while offering more challenging difficulties and maps for the more serious player. This game goes on sale regularly for $2.50, so how could I not recommend it? Like seriously, this game is cheaper than a cheeseburger.
Хе-хе-хе-хе... ну всё, больше не ждите пощады!
Extremely good, and incredibly tense zombie survival game. A million times better than COD Zombies in my opinion.

Игра отличная, советую любителям хорроров, а так же можете поиграть в KF2.

Оценка: 9 патриархов из 10.

Killing Floor is a Zombie Survival Game which includes 2 gamemodes, Survival & Objective Mode.
In survival mode, players have to survive 4 - 10 waves (depending on what they chose) and between each wave, there would be a trader whom sell guns, ammo, healthpacks and armor (to make your game more realistic, use the mutation known as "No Trader") After the final wave is done, there would be a final boss which is extremely hard.
In objective mode, players have to survive AND complete the objectives they are needed to. After a few objectives are completed, the trader would open up.

Pros :
- Thrilling & Fun Zombie Survival Game
- A Steam Workshop where you can download additional community-made content
- Festival Updates e.g. Christmas

Cons :
- May get Boring
- A lot of bugs in the game
- Expenisve DLCs (4 Gold Weapon Skins for 7.99 USD)

Summary :
Overall, Killing Floor is one of the best Zombie Survival Games I've played and it will to you too.
I give it a 7/10.

KILLING FLOOR is one of my favorite games! A Variety of Zombies, Different Weapons, Maps, Player Models & Perks. It also has Teamwork, Survival and Horror E.T.C. AND it has different events like Summer Sideshow Event (Clown zombies and Carnivals) Christmas Event (Santa last boss, elves as zombies) Halloween Event (Wierd ass entertaining funny shiet EVERY TIME!) -love this game

The wast majority of both Pistols, Shotguns, Machineguns, Explosives, Pyrotecs and even Melee weapons gives each perk a role to fill perfectly, and the best thing about using perks instead of classes: THERE IS NO WEAPON RESTRICTION! -You are a Support specialist who uses shotguns? Got space and cash for a 50 cal.? BUY IT!

-Includes Custom maps, ask me for a Map! -THIS GAME ROCKZ!
-New "Objective mode" added in last patch! (as of the date on this review) adds Missions, Objectives and small tasks to the game!
gruesomely addictive >:)

I love playing Killing Floor. It's a game based genuinely on gameplay and the experience, not the graphics quality. Extremely enjoyable, and can be played competitively or just for a boredom-buster!
Playing without crosshairs also makes it extremely enjoyable.
You don't need a kickass rig to run it either, I was playing it every day on an old Compaq with a rock-bottom video card and a mere 1.75GB of RAM. Give it a shot!

次々と出現するクリーチャー（ゾンビ？）をとにかく撃ちまくる、WAVEクリア型のFPSです。最後にボスもでます。
当作品の特徴的な機能で、各WAVE終了後にショップが開かれ（場所もWAVEごとに変わります）
そこで敵を倒すごとに得られる資金で強力な武器や弾薬などを購入して次の襲撃に備えます。
時間制限もあり結構忙しいです。（WAVE最後の敵はショップの近くで倒すなどのテクニックも必要になってきます）

回復能力や近接が得意、爆発物が得意といったクラスが用意されていて１つを選択して戦います。
それぞれのクラスにはLVの概念があり成長要素もあります。

難易度は選べますが、簡単な難易度でもソロではクリアが難しく複数人での協力プレイ（COOP）
が前提かと思われるゲームバランスですので、仲間でわいわいやるのがお勧めです。

Probably one of the most fun game's i've ever spent 3 dollars on. The game runs smoothly even on a crappy laptop like mine and is alot of fun, nine times out of ten you're going to have a great team to play with, and the majority of players are friendly and helpful. This game is great for anyone who enjoys Left 4 dead and its alot more gruesome. This game encourages teamwork and watching eachothers backs. There's no difficult learning curve to the game at all, it's just a matter of aiming and ammo consumption. The different classes almost mean nothing until you find out which one you prefer. It's a must have when you're bored of everything else.
